content: make 2 squares do not cut the yarn after second square is finished repeat round 4 four times more 8 rounds total or until your square measures 5 9 /15 5 cm pattern copyright katyanovikova © 2023 this pattern is for personal use only it cannot be sold or reproduced in any form fully or partially feel free to sell the items that are made from this pattern if you sell them online please link to the original pattern items cannot be mass-produced 4 this pattern cannot be distributed through any sources except katya novikova s ravelry store choose the rs and ws of your squares put squares together with rs facing border each other you will work on ws using 3 5 mm e hook join squares with slip_stitch working in both loops there is a good tutorial how to make it change to 3 mm hook after you reached 2nd top corner join both of corners with slip_stitch and proceed joining squares row 1 chain 1 single_crochet in top of each double_crochet of granny square worked in the round 2 single_crochet in each beginning chain 3 and each last double_crochet of the following row join with slip_stitch do not turn row 2 chain 1 reverse single_crochet in blo of each single_crochet across join with slip_stitch cut the yarn and fasten_off weave in all ends don t cut the yarn after squares are joined turn the piece rs out and work the border as follows pattern copyright katyanovikova ©
